headline: Revvity (RVTY): Evaluating the Stock’s True Value After Its New Imaging Innovation Center Launch
summary: Revvity (RVTY) just opened the doors of its new In Vivo Imaging Center of Excellence in North Carolina’s Research Triangle, bringing together its software, hardware, and biology teams under one roof. With this move, the company aims to accelerate the development of imaging systems that leverage AI and advanced technologies, positioning itself at the intersection of research innovation and practical problem-solving for disease science. For investors watching Revvity, this strategic push may...
